Described Disease.Described Disease: Breast Cancer; Ovarian Cancer; Hereditary Myopathy

Material used.Material Name: HEK293/MCF-7/Primary cells from patients with BRCA mutations
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line. Patient-derived materials were also used for validation.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was undetectable for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A.
Protein expression showed increased levels for the variant NM_007292.4:c.617delT.
Protein expression levels were comparable to wild-type for the variant NM_000158.3:c.422C>A.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using breast and ovarian tumor samples from patients with known BRCA mutations.

Readout description.Result Description: qPCR analysis showed increased expression of the variant NM_007292.4:c.617delT in tumor samples.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure accuracy.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type RNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative controls were included in each run to ensure no contamination.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels below 10% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels above 50% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using breast and ovarian tumor tissues from patients with known BRCA mutations.

Readout description.Result Description: Immunohistochemistry analysis showed increased protein expression in tumors harboring the variant NM_007292.4:c.617delT.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Normal tissue samples were used as a positive control for protein expression.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative controls were included in each run to ensure no background staining.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Staining intensity below 2+ on a scale of 0 to 3.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Staining intensity above 1+ on a scale of 0 to 3.
